Summary: Super silver shining ovaly cigar shaped UFO hovering just below clouds no movenent approx 10km far from us the size of a old zeppelin huge.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Ladybrand
There were no other sightings in Ladybrand on or around June 25th 2009
Object Shape: Bullet, Missile, Cigar, Cylinder, Oval, Sphere
divs: Sighting Detailsas we where driving on the road to ladybrand and we were looking at the mountains with snow i noticed a bright shining starlike object very very bright the sun was reflecting of its body it seamed to be moving but sooo slow like it was soaking up the sun then it seemed to stop and jus hover we first thought it (a plane) but no plane could hover or travel so slow just f#@&*67 amazing it seemed to become bigger as we traveled around it longer. i still don't know what we saw .....strange then we traveled further untill it was gone behind the mountain we did not stop we could not say if it shot away or anything... Damn
